data.client_settings: [BUILD INFO] Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 27466
data.actual_result: "You do not have permission to send messages in this channel." is really hard to read.
data.expected_result: You're supposed to be able to read "You do not have permission to send messages in this channel." with ease
data.short_description: "You do not have permission to send messages in this channel." in light theme is super hard to read
data.steps_to_repro: - Go open up Discord (Canary) - Make sure to set your theme to light - Go to a text channel in any server where you don't have permission to talk - You'll notice "You do not have permission to send messages in this channel." and it's really hard to read
